titleStmt.title: Cains off-spring demonstrated, as by their works they are discovered in a bitter persecution against the Lords people at Newark Upon Trent, in the county of Nottingham: being here truly related as it was suffered and executed at two several meetings. / Published for the truths sake, by those whom the proud in heart calls Quakers.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Simmons at the Sign of the Bull and Mouth near Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library, London.
